description: This file is a header file (.h) defining interfaces, constants, and function declarations related to Service Control APIs for a software component. It includes licensing information, macro definitions, function prototypes for initializing, deinitializing, and managing service restart lists, as well as utility functions for service restart queue handling.

methods.name: GetParamName
methods.description: Retrieves the parameter name for a given path.

methods.name: svc_restart_queue_loop
methods.description: Loop function for handling service restart queue in a separate thread.

methods.name: spawn_svc_restart_queue_loop
methods.description: Starts the service restart queue handling loop thread.

methods.name: push_svc_to_queue
methods.description: Pushes a service restart request into the queue.

methods.name: ServiceControl_Get_Sevice_Restart_List
methods.description: Gets the list of services scheduled for restart, returned as a comma-delimited string.

methods.name: ServiceControl_Set_Sevice_Restart_List
methods.description: Sets the list of services to be restarted, given as a comma-delimited string.
